name: Prana Halle Straight - Women's
description: The Halle Pants are loaded with technical features that make them excellent for travel and active days.Prana Stretch Zion fabric provides UPF 50 protection.DWR finish sheds light rain and looks cleaner for longer.Darts at knees.Pocket for necessities and a hidden stash pocket for valuables.Mid-rise fit sits comfortably at the hips.Relaxed fit.
